ComicInfo.Summary:
The Stage is Set! Street Fighter II begins the journey to the epic World Warrior Tournament, catching up with all of your favourite fighters and delving into the backstory of the greatest threat the world has ever known -- M. Bison! Plus! In this issue, an artistic tour-de-force by Arnold Tsang depicts the final, fatal confrontation between Gokken and Akuma!
The historic battle between Akuma and Gouken, the origin of M.Bison & Ryu meets Dhalsim.
